main.name: Samuele Pozzini
main.description: Constantly learning, took example from Life.I DEVOUR Web Developing
main.bio: Hello there! My name is Samuele Pozzini aka. Sam and I am a Junior Full-Stack Developer.By job is being a multitasking human being as I am the Founder and CEO of Qube-Site, a Start-Up with aim of revolutionize Web Development, I also work for a Start-Up Company named BookMe-Cab in which I built a Uber-Like app (just that it is 100x better), I am also a Freelancer and none the less I'M A STUDENT currently in Secondary High-School! My motto is:'Everything is Difficult, but Nothing is Impossible', and guys, If I managed to get to where I am today, you can do so as well.
main.contactmessage: For any work-related puprpouse, get in touch with me, we'll have an amazing working collab. Or just passing by to say Hi.

work.title: Founder and CEO
work.description: Bringing to life what the REAL world of Web Dev is. Developing websites/ web apps of all kind. Managing and directing various Teams.

work.title: Founder, CEO and Junior Full-Stack Developer
work.description: Managing all the technical aspects of the company. Developing and Managing the majority of Web API.

work.title: My Own Boss
work.description: I started adventuring in the Freelancing world for almoust an year, and I learned quite a bunch of Soft-Skills such as: Time Managing, Project Managing etc...

testimonials.text: Sam is surely enough excelling at his Job, within our entire Working Collab, he's never failed once...When they ask me something about the Web, that's the man I call.
Sam is a great Teacher! He explains the right stuff at the right time not even doing it on purpose! Definetly Recommend.
Sam fullfilled all of our requests. Really satisfied of the outcome. Definetly reccomend him.
